pinyin: tuo1 yang3 he2 tang2 he2 suan1
xin4 shi3 he2 tang2 he2 suan1
qu4 yang3 he2 tang2 he2 suan1

sentences.english: This inhibited the process of translation, producing a homogeneous population of empty ribosomes.
sentences.chinese: 這抑制了翻譯的過程，產生了一個均勻的核糖空缺。

sentences.english: If ribosomes depended on proteins to function, that would have been a paradox.
sentences.chinese: 如果核糖體依靠蛋白質起作用，那會變成一個悖論。

sentences.english: Human pancreatic ribonuclease has 128 amino acid residues.
sentences.chinese: 人的胰腺核糖核酸酶有128個氨基酸殘基。

sentences.english: What is the function of ligase in DNA replication?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是連接酶的作用在脫氧核糖核酸複製的？

sentences.english: All sorts of mutational damage to animals' DNA would have occurred.
sentences.chinese: 動物的脫氧核糖核酸可能遭到了各種各樣的突變破壞。

sentences.english: The molecular evolution of ribosome-inactivating protein gene family in Momordica charantia L.
sentences.chinese: 探討苦瓜核糖體失活蛋白基因家族分子演化之研究。

sentences.english: DNA told the body how to build proteins.
sentences.chinese: 脫氧核糖核酸告訴身體如何建立蛋白質。

sentences.english: Any of a group of enteroviruses that can cause a disease resembling poliomyelitis but without paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 病毒小，由核糖核酸單鏈構成，能在植物中引起疾病。

sentences.english: Here you can see a particulate organelle called the ribosome.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏您可以看到一個名爲顆粒細胞的核糖體。

sentences.english: They are the sites of action of many antibiotics that inhibit protein biosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 細菌核糖體是許多抗生素抑制蛋白質合成的作用點。

sentences.english: The blueprints are transformed into living matter through the work of structures called ribosomes.
sentences.chinese: 這些藍圖通過被稱爲核糖體的結構轉化成生命體。

sentences.english: No dates are ribose Ruicheng County famous West Village street.
sentences.chinese: 無核糖棗是芮城縣西陌鄉的名產。

sentences.english: As a result, the ribosome produces only viral proteins.
sentences.chinese: 結果，核糖體產生了只有過濾性毒菌的蛋白質。

sentences.english: Eventually ribozymes began to copy RNA without external help.
sentences.chinese: 最終核糖酶不需要外在幫助就能啓動複製RNA。

sentences.english: Understanding ribosomes is important for a scientific understanding of life.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解核糖體對於科學地瞭解生命之源至關重要。

sentences.english: DNA is the short form of deoxyribonucleic acid .
sentences.chinese: DNA是脫氧核糖核酸的縮寫形式。

definition: pentose (CH2O)5, monosaccharide with five carbon atoms, such as ribose 核糖[he2 tang2]
peptide chain (chain of amino acids making up protein)
peptidoglycan (PG) or murein (polymer of sugars and amino acids forming cell wall)
peptide bond CO-NH/bond in protein between carboxyl radical and amino radical
